thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: emma stewart

author: emma stewart
title: emma stewart
text: Just started using Airtasker, and I have no issues at all with the service. My only query would be that there seems to be a lag in comments/messages between when the poster actually does these and when they show up in the app - sometimes there's half an hour in between, so you have to keep checking your emails to see peoples' responses in a more timely manner. But apart from that, everything else works well.
